00047     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC(PagingLandScapeData2DManager *dataMgr)
00049     : PagingLandScapeData2D(dataMgr)
00050     {
00051             mImage = 0;
00052             input_max = 3000.0f;
00053         input_min = 0.0f;
00054         mMaxheight = _decodeTC (1.0f) * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00055     }

00057     //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::getMaxAbsoluteHeight(void) const
00059     { 
00060         return _decodeTC (1.0f) * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00061     }

00077     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00078     const Vector3 PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::getNormalAt (const Real x, const Real z)
00079     {
00080         #ifndef _LOADEDNORM
00081             return PagingLandScapeData2D::getNormal(x,z);
00082         #else
00083             if (mImage)
00084             {
00085                 unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((z * mSize  + x) * mBpp);//4 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00086 
00087                 if (mMax > Pos)
00088                 {
00089                     const Real normalscale = 1.0f / 127.0f;
00090                     return Vector3 (((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 0]) - 128.0f) * normalscale,
00091                                     ((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 1]) - 128.0f) * normalscale,
00092                                     ((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 2]) - 128.0f) * normalscale);
00093                 }
00094                 else
00095                 {
00096                     return Vector3::UNIT_Y;
00097                 }
00098             }
00099             else
00100             {
00101                 return Vector3::UNIT_Y;
00102             }
00103         #endif //_NOLOAD
00104  
00105     }
00106     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00107     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_save()
00108     {
00109        
00110             const Real scale = 1.0f  / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00111            
00112             uchar *img = mImage->getData();
00113             unsigned int j = 0;
00114             const unsigned int bpp = static_cast <unsigned int> (mBpp);
00115             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMax - 1;  i += bpp)
00116             {
00117                 img[ i + (mBpp - 1)] =  uchar (_encodeTC(mHeightData[j++]) * scale);               
00118             }
00119             const String fname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + ".HN." + 
00120                                         StringConverter::toString(mPageZ) + "." +
00121                                                     StringConverter::toString(mPageX) + ".";
00122             const String extname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00123 
00124 
00125         FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00126                 mParent->getOptions()->groupName, 
00127                 fname + extname);
00128         FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00129         if (it != finfo->end())
00130         {
00131             //FileInfo *inf = &(*it);
00132             char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
00133             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory()
00134             mImage->save (fname + "modif." + extname);
00135             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory();
00136             RetablishDir (olddir);
00137         }
00138       
00139     }
00140     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00141     bool PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_load(const unsigned int mX, const unsigned int mZ)
00142     { 
00143         const String strFileName = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + ".HN." + 
00144                             StringConverter::toString(mZ) + "." +
00145                                         StringConverter::toString(mX) + ".";
00146 
00147         String finalName = strFileName + 
00148                         "modif." + 
00149                         mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00150         if (!(mParent->getOptions()->Deformable && 
00151             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName,
00152             finalName)))
00153         {
00154             finalName = strFileName + 
00155                 mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;  
00156             if (!ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName,
00157                 finalName))
00158             { 
00159                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(String("PLSM2 : Cannot find map named ") + finalName, 
00160                     LML_CRITICAL,
00161                     true);
00162                 return false;
00163             }
00164         }
00165         mImage = new Image();
00166         mImage->load (finalName,  mParent->getOptions()->groupName); 
00167         
00168         //check to make sure it's 2^n + 1 size.
00169         if (mImage->getWidth() != mImage->getHeight() ||        !_checkSize(mImage->getWidth()))
00170         {
00171             String err = "Error: Invalid heightmap size : " +
00172                 StringConverter::toString(static_cast <unsigned int> (mImage->getWidth())) +
00173                 "," + StringConverter::toString(static_cast <unsigned int> (mImage->getHeight())) +
00174                 ". Should be 2^n+1, 2^n+1";
00175             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, err, "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00176         }
00177 
00178         mBpp = PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (mImage->getFormat ());
00179         if (mBpp != 4)
00180         {
00181             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Error: Image is not a RGBA image.(4 bytes, 32 bits)", 
00182                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00183         }
00184 
00185         if (mSize != mImage->getWidth())
00186         {
00187             OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Error: Declared World size <> Height Map Size.", "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00188         }
00189 
00190         mXDimension = mImage->getWidth();
00191         mZDimension = mImage->getHeight();
00192         mMax = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mImage->getHeight() * mBpp + 1);
00193 
00194         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mImage->getHeight());
00195         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00196         unsigned int j = 0;
00197         const double divider = 1.0 / 255;
00198         const Real scale  = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00199         uchar *data = mImage->getData();
00200         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00201         const unsigned int bpp = static_cast <unsigned int> (mBpp);
00202         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMax - 1;  i += bpp)
00203             {  
00204                 const Real h = _decodeTC(data[ i + (mBpp - 1)] * divider)* scale;
00205                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00206                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00207             }
00208         return true;
00209     }
00210     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00211     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_load()
00212     {
00213            
00214                     mImage = new Image();
00215 
00216                     mImage->load(mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + 
00217                 "." + mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension, 
00218                     mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00219 
00220                     //check to make sure it's 2^n size.
00221                     if (!_checkSize(mImage->getHeight()) ||     !_checkSize(mImage->getWidth()))
00222                     {
00223                             String err = "Error: Invalid heightmap size : " +
00224                                     StringConverter::toString(static_cast <unsigned int> (mImage->getWidth())) +
00225                                     "," + StringConverter::toString(static_cast <unsigned int> (mImage->getHeight())) +
00226                                     ". Should be 2^n, 2^n";
00227                             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, err, "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_load");
00228                     }
00229 
00230             mBpp = PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (mImage->getFormat ());
00231             if (mBpp != 1)
00232                     {
00233                             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Error: Image is not a grayscale image.(1 byte, 8 bits)", 
00234                     "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_load");
00235                     }
00236 
00237             mSize = static_cast <unsigned int> (mImage->getWidth());
00238             mMax = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mImage->getHeight() * mBpp + 1);
00239 
00240             mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mImage->getHeight());
00241             mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00242             unsigned int j = 0;
00243             const double divider = 1.0 / 255;
00244             const Real scale  = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00245             uchar *data = mImage->getData();
00246             mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00247             const unsigned int bpp = static_cast <unsigned int> (mBpp);
00248             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMax - 1;  i += bpp)
00249             {  
00250                 const Real h = _decodeTC(data[ i + (mBpp - 1)] * divider)* scale;
00251                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00252                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00253             }
00254             
00255     }

00258     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00259     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_unload()
00260     {   
00261             delete mImage;
00262             mImage = 0;
00263     }
00264 
00265     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00266     inline Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_decodeTC(const Real encoded) const
00267     {
00268             return ((Real) (encoded + 0.5f)) * (input_max - input_min) + input_min;
00269     }
00270 
00271     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00272     inline uchar PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC::_encodeTC(const Real decoded) const
00273     {
00274         return static_cast<uchar> ((decoded - input_min) / (input_max - input_min) - 0.5f);
00275     }
